com.reportmill.graphics

Class RMShadowEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • SnapObject
      • com.reportmill.graphics.RMEffect
        • com.reportmill.graphics.RMImageEffect
          • com.reportmill.graphics.RMShadowEffect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class RMShadowEffect
extends RMImageEffect
    This class adds a shadow to a given shape.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.reportmill.graphics.RMImageEffect

      RMShadowEffect deriveFill(int aRadius)

      Returns a shadow effect just like this one, but with new offsets.
